description: Develop and maintain UI components using React.js. Collaborate with backend developers and designers to create responsive, user-friendly applications. Optimize web apps for performance and scalability. Troubleshoot UI/UX issues and implement improvements. Participate in agile development and code reviews.
educationRequired: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field

description: Support marketing campaigns, content creation, and analytics.

Create compelling visual content for digital campaigns, print materials, and social media. Work closely with the marketing and content team to design creatives that align with brand identity. Prepare graphics, illustrations, and layouts for company presentations, product materials, and more. Stay up-to-date with design trends and tools.
educationRequired: Diploma or Bachelor’s in Graphic Design or similar

description: Provide exceptional support to customers via phone, email, and chat. Resolve product-related inquiries, troubleshoot technical issues, and escalate complex problems. Maintain detailed records of customer interactions. Contribute to the creation of support documentation and FAQs. Ensure customer satisfaction by following up on unresolved issues.
Build and maintain RESTful APIs and database systems.

Write SEO-friendly blog posts, product descriptions, social media content, and press releases. Collaborate with marketing and design teams to align content with brand voice and campaign goals. Research industry trends and integrate them into compelling content strategies. Proofread and edit content for grammar, clarity, and tone.
educationRequired: Bachelor’s in English, Journalism, or related field

description: Promote and sell products at events and in-store.
Learn and assist with software development tasks.
Manage volunteers and coordinate outreach programs.
Design user-friendly interfaces and conduct usability testing.
